title: Flight Simulator 2020 - PMDG - DC6 updated to 2.00.0028
description:
PMDG has released another update for their DC6. It is the third update the airplane receives in a short timeframe which fixes issues in the following categories:

- external view
- documentation
- virtual cockpit

If you also want to give the aircraft a try you can download it from the site below:
https://pmdg.com/pmdg-dc-6-for-msfs/
